pages.text: The $(item)Rune of Augmented Capacity$() increases the capacity of the $(l:bloodmagic:altar/blood_altar)Blood Altar$(/l) by a multiplicative +7.5% per rune. The Augmented Capacity runes apply $(o)after$() the regular $(l:bloodmagic:altar/blood_rune/capacity_rune)Capacity runes$().

With some $(item)Netherite Scrap$() and some $(item)Intricate Hellforged Parts$() looted from the $(l:bloodmagic:dungeons/endless_realm)Demon Realm$(), you can double the power of your $(item)Rune of Augmented Capacity$(), increasing the capacity of the $(l:bloodmagic:altar/blood_altar)Blood Altar$(/l) by a multiplicative +15% per rune.
If you change your mind, you can undo the recipe in the ARC.
